title: Three treatises The pearle of the gospell, The pilgrims profession: and A glasse for gentlewomen to dress themselues by. To which is added A short introduction to the worthy receiuing of the Lords supper. By Thomas Taylor, Doctor of Diuinity, and late preacher of Aldermanbury Church in London.
author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
publisher: Printed by I. B[eale] for Iohn Bartlet, at the gilt Cup in Cheaq-side [sic],
notes: "The pearle of the gospell", "The pilgrims profession" (which is signed "H.G." i.e. H. Gunter), "A glass for gentlewomen to dresse themselues by" and "A short introduction to the worthy receiuing of the Lords Supper" have separate dated title pages.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
